events.message: Customer reported a car accident that happened on the highway involving their sedan and another vehicle.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident given the involvement of the insured’s car in the collision.
An agent specializing in auto accident claims has been assigned to handle this case efficiently.
Customer received an acknowledgment confirming receipt of the claim and next steps to proceed.
Request sent for accident photos, police report, and vehicle registration documents to verify the claim.
Customer submitted all requested documents including detailed photos of vehicle damage and the police report.
Investigation team has begun reviewing submitted materials and interviewing involved parties to assess liability.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the insured was not at fault for the accident.
A fair settlement amount covering repairs and rental car fees has been proposed to the customer.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and the professional handling of their claim.
Claim has been officially approved and authorized for payment based on accepted settlement terms.
Payment issued promptly to the customer’s account covering all agreed compensation for the accident.
The claim has been closed successfully with all processes completed and customer notified accordingly.
All claim documents and records have been archived following the closure of the auto accident case.
